name: House Stairs
description:
Controls

WASD -  Movement

R - Reload

Esc - Pause

Left Mouse button - Shoot

Right Mouse button  - Aim Iron sight

Go UP on stairs to refill ammo

Go DOWN on stairs to regain health

Go near defense to repair defense. 

NOTE - Some zombies may not attack you sometimes because they don't have brains. But they are your enemies. So kill them before they kill you.

THIS GAME WAS MADE SOLO FOR THE MEGAJAM 2022. Assets and music are royalty free from unreal market place, maximo and others.
